segments.text: I understand we will need seven air conditioning units on the two floors.That ' s what you think , yes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You could use five or six units.But five or six wouldn't be very efficient . I recommend seven .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And if we take the Decker units you suggested , what would the price be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me calculate the price for you . I can give you a 15 % discount if you buy the seven units.Let ' s see here . Your total would be 5929 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Isn't there any way we can get central air conditioning in this building ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As I said , it is possible , but it would be much more expensive . I think it would be at least 12000 dollars to do a complete system .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too much . We need to use the separate units , I guess .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's more practical , and the new units really are very quiet.Your customers won't even notice them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you say we can do it for 6000 dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's for the units.Installation would probably be another 700 to 1000 dollars.But it depends on the time spent , of course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean installation isn't included ? I'm very surprised .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , Ma'am . Installation isn't included.The price I quoted was just for the units .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In Taipei , you know , the company usually installs the things they sell.They don't charge extra .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know that , Ma'am . But they would just raise the price of the units to cover their costs.Here in L . A . , installation is charged separately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I suppose I should get used to it.But I'm not really willing to spend more than 6000 dollars for this.We haven't even opened yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand , Ma'am .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And the other company that gave me a quote on this said they could do it for 4000 dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a question of quality , Ma'am . At that price , you would not get good equipment . I've been in this business for almost twenty years . I know what happens.If you don't get quality air conditioning now , you will just have to replace the system after two years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will tell you what I can agree to.If you can quote me a price of 6000 dollars , installation included , I can accept .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You do seem like a better company than the other one.So I am willing to pay more than 4000 for you . But I won't pay more than 6000 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we don't usually do it , but ... I believe we can accommodate you on this.We will do the installation for free . Because we appreciate your business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I hope we can arrange the contract as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1
